metadata.title: CVE-2015-0841 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Off-by-one error in the readBuf function in listener.cpp in libcapsinetworkand monopd before 0.9.8, allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (crash) via a long line.

criterions.comment: libcapsinetwork: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
monopd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
